name: Blobby Volley 2
description:
Blobby Volley 2 is one of the most popular volleyball games and the official sequel to Blobby Volley 1 by Daniel S. and Silvio M. . The offical Blobby Volley 2 app contains all the functionality of the pc game and brings it to your mobile device!

Features:
- Singleplayer:
- Many computer controlled opponents
- Different degrees of difficulty
- Multiplayer:
- Online und league
- Local network (LAN)
- Variable game speed
- Choose your blobby color
- Exchangeable backgrounds
- Replays
- Different game modes:
- Classic
- Back Defence
- Blitz
- Firewall
- Jumping Jack
- One Hit Wonder
- Sticky Mode
- Tennis
- The Double
- Classic - Blobby Volley 1
- and much more!

This version supports league play at http://blobby-liga.de!

Have fun with the game,
Daniel Knobe
